CHECK MAIL RECEIVE
Usage: check mail <person> receive
The commands used by the Midgaard Mail System (MMS) are MAIL, CHECK, and RECEIVE. These commands can only be used while in an Official MMS Post Office. You must be at least second level in order to use the MMS.
Examples:
To check and see if you have any mail waiting: > check
To write mail to Niandra: > mail Niandra
To ask the Postmaster to give you your mail, if you have any waiting: > receive
Stamps cost 150 coins.
